content:
Sure, here is a revised version of the prompt that only includes a description of Sofia herself:

"Sofia is a beautiful girl in her twenties with long, curly brunette hair and deep brown eyes. She has a small, heart-shaped face with high cheekbones and a pert nose, and her full lips are slightly parted. Sofia is toned and fit, with a slender, athletic build and long, toned legs. She has full upper body parts and lower body parts and a narrow waist, and her arms are slender and strong.

Sofia exudes confidence and poise, and her beauty and femininity are on full display. The soft lighting and high-quality photograph capture every detail of her appearance, from her long, curly hair and deep brown eyes to her full lips and toned figure. Sofia's body and face convey relaxation and allure."
